snippet: A Massachusetts chemist accused of faking test results on drug samples in criminal cases was indicted by a grand jury on Monday.
abstract: Massachusetts chemist Annie Dookhan is indicted on charges of obstruction of justice, tampering with evidence, perjury and pretending to hold a college degree for allegedly faking test results on drug samples in criminal cases.
lead_paragraph: A Massachusetts chemist accused of faking test results on drug samples in criminal cases was indicted by a grand jury on Monday.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Chemist for the State Is Indicted
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Chemist For the State Is Indicted
